file.name: documentation_domain_v1.0.4.yaml
file.content:
# OpenAPI version identifier - required for OpenAPI 3.0 domains openapi: 3.0.3 ####################### # Optional info section ####################### info: title: DCSA - Documentation Components description: | Common components for DCSA Documentation APIs. This domain is used by - Electronic Bill of Lading (EBL) version: 1.0.4 components: schemas: ###################################### # Booking Related objects ###################################### bookingHeaderNoID: description: | includes the information requested in a booking, service terms and types as well as the assigned booking reference by the carrier. type: object allOf: - type: object properties: bookingRequestID: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/bookingRequestID' - type: object properties: receiptDeliveryTypeAtOrigin: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/receiptDeliveryTypeAtOrigin' - type: object properties: receiptDeliveryTypeAtDestination: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/receiptDeliveryTypeAtDestination' - type: object properties: cargoMovementTypeAtOrigin: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/cargoMovementTypeAtOrigin' - type: object properties: cargoMovementTypeAtDestination: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/cargoMovementTypeAtDestination' - type: object properties: bookingRequestDateTime: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/bookingRequestDateTime' - type: object properties: serviceContractReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/serviceContractReference' - type: object properties: cargoGrossWeightUnit: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/weightUnit' - type: object properties: partialLoadAllowed: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/partialLoadAllowed' - type: object properties: exportDeclarationRequired: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/exportDeclarationRequired' - type: object properties: exportDeclarationReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/exportDeclarationReference' - type: object properties: importLicenseRequired: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/importLicenseRequired' - type: object properties: importLicenseReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/importLicenseReference' - type: object properties: placeOfReceiptPickupDate: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/placeOfReceiptPickupDate' - type: object properties: finalDestinationExpectedArrivalDate: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/finalDestinationExpectedArrivalDate' - type: object properties: destinationFilingRequired: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/destinationFilingRequired' - type: object properties: OTICarrierCode: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/OTICarrierCode' - type: object properties: 800SeriesCarrierCode: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/800SeriesCarrierCode' - type: object properties: contractQuotationReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/contractQuotationReference' - type: object properties: expectedDepartureDate: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/expectedDepartureDate' - type: object properties: transportDocumentType: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/transportDocumentType' - type: object properties: transportDocumentReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/transportDocumentReference' - type: object properties: bookingChannelReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/bookingChannelReference' - type: object properties: incoterms: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/incoterms' - type: object properties: valueAddedServiceRequest: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/valueAddedServiceRequest' - type: object properties: invoicePayableAt: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/LOCATION_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/location' - type: object properties: exportLicenseIssueDate: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/exportLicenseIssueDate' - type: object properties: exportLicenseExpiryDate: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/exportLicenseExpiryDate' - type: object properties: communicationChannel: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/communicationChannel' - type: object properties: equipmentSubstitutionAllowed: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/equipmentSubstitutionAllowed' required: - receiptDeliveryTypeAtOrigin - receiptDeliveryTypeAtDestination - cargoMovementTypeAtOrigin - cargoMovementTypeAtDestination - bookingRequestDateTime - cargoGrossWeightUnit - partialLoadAllowed - exportDeclarationRequired - importLicenseRequired - transportDocumentType - communicationChannel - equipmentSubstitutionAllowed bookingHeader: description: | includes the information requested in a booking, service terms and types as well as the assigned booking reference by the carrier. type: object allOf: - type: object properties: carrierBookingReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/carrierBookingReference' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bookingHeaderNoID' required: - carrierBookingReference bookingNoID: description: | includes the information requested in a booking, service terms and types as well as the assigned booking reference by the carrier. type: object allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bookingHeaderNoID' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/commodities' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/transportDraft' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/requestedEquipments' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/documentParties' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/shipmentLocations' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/references' required: - commodities booking: description: | includes the information requested in a booking, service terms and types as well as the assigned booking reference by the carrier. type: object allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/bookingHeader' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/commodities' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/transportDraft' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/requestedEquipments' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/documentParties' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/shipmentLocations' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/references' required: - commodities ############################ # Cargo Item Related objects ############################ commodities: type: object properties: commodities: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/commodity' commodity: type: object description: | Type of goods in the booking, defined by its commodity type allOf: - type: object properties: commodityType: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/commodityType' - type: object properties: HSCode: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/HSCode' - type: object properties: cargoGrossWeight: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/cargoGrossWeight' required: - commodityType - cargoGrossWeight transportDraft: type: object description: | Missing... properties: transportDraft: type: object allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/vessels' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/voyages' vessels: type: object properties: vessels: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/vessel' vessel: type: object description: | describes a floating, sea going structure (mother vessels and feeder vessels) with either an internal or external mode of propulsion designed for the transport of cargo and/or passengers. Ocean vessels are uniquely identified by an IMO number consisting of 7 digits, or alternatively by their AIS signal with an MMSI number. allOf: - type: object properties: vesselIMONumber: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/vesselIMONumber' - type: object properties: vesselName: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/vesselName' - type: object properties: vesselFlag: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/vesselFlag' - type: object properties: vesselCallSignNumber: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/vesselCallSignNumber' - type: object properties: vesselOperatorCarrierCode: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/vesselOperatorCarrierCode' - type: object properties: vesselOperatorCarrierCodeListProvider: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/vesselOperatorCarrierCodeListProvider' required: - vesselIMONumber voyages: type: object properties: voyages: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/voyage' voyage: type: object description: | describes the part of a service roundtrip that typically changes at the geographical “end-point” of a vessel rotation. As such, that specific port call can have two voyage numbers: one for the discharge of final shipments on the “current” voyage, and one that identifies the commencement of loading shipments (for allocation purposes). One rotation will typically have 2 voyages, one on each haul allOf: - type: object properties: voyageID: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/voyageID' - type: object properties: carrierVoyageNumber: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/carrierVoyageNumber' - type: object properties: serviceID: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/serviceID' requestedEquipments: type: object properties: requestedEquipments: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/requestedEquipment' requestedEquipment: type: object description: | The requested equipments for the ship allOf: - type: object properties: requestedEquipmentType: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/ISOEquipmentCode' - type: object properties: requestedEquipmentUnits: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/requestedEquipmentUnits' - type: object properties: isShipperOwned: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/isShipperOwned' ###################################### # Shipping Instruction Related objects ###################################### shippingInstructionHeaderNoID: description: 'an enrichment to the original booking shared by the shipper to the carrier. The shipping instruction includes volume or weight, cargo items, shipping dates, origin, destination, and other special instructions. The information given by the shipper through the shipping instruction is the information required to create a Transport Document.' type: object allOf: - type: object properties: transportDocumentType: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/transportDocumentType' - type: object properties: isShippedOnboardType: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/isShippedOnboardType' - type: object properties: numberOfCopies: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/numberOfCopies' - type: object properties: numberOfOriginals: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/numberOfOriginals' - type: object properties: preCarriageUnderShippersResponsibility: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/preCarriageUnderShippersResponsibility' - type: object properties: invoicePayableAt: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/LOCATION_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/location' # Extending invoicePayableAt in order to alter example and description - type: object properties: invoicePayableAt: description: 'A location object - here with an example with only UN location code and City name present' example: UNLocationCode: 'USNYC' address: cityName: 'København' stateRegion: 'N/A' country: 'Denmark' - type: object properties: isElectronic: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/isElectronic' - type: object properties: isChargesDisplayed: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/isChargesDisplayed' - type: object properties: carrierBookingReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/carrierBookingReference' # Extend the carrierBookingReference description for SI - type: object properties: carrierBookingReference: description: 'The associated booking number provided by the carrier. Cannot be used in combination with Cargo Item level carrierBookingReference' required: - transportDocumentType - isShippedOnboardType - invoicePayableAt - isElectronic shippingInstructionHeader: description: 'an enrichment to the original booking shared by the shipper to the carrier. The shipping instruction includes volume or weight, cargo items, shipping dates, origin, destination, and other special instructions. The information given by the shipper through the shipping instruction is the information required to create a Transport Document.' type: object allOf: - type: object properties: shippingInstructionID: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/shippingInstructionID' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/shippingInstructionHeaderNoID' required: - shippingInstructionID shippingInstructionNoID: description: 'an enrichment to the original booking shared by the shipper to the carrier. The shipping instruction includes volume or weight, cargo items, shipping dates, origin, destination, and other special instructions. The information given by the shipper through the shipping instruction is the information required to create a Transport Document.' type: object allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/shippingInstructionHeaderNoID' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/cargoItems' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/utilizedTransportEquipments' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/documentParties' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/shipmentLocations' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/references' shippingInstruction: description: 'The Shipping Instruction is an enrichment to the original booking shared by the shipper to the carrier. The shipping instruction includes volume or weight, cargo items, shipping dates, origin, destination, and other special instructions. The information given by the shipper through the shipping instruction is the information required to create a Transport Document.' type: object allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/shippingInstructionHeader' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/cargoItems' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/utilizedTransportEquipments' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/documentParties' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/shipmentLocations' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/references' ############################ # Cargo Item Related objects ############################ cargoItems: type: object properties: cargoItems: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/cargoItem' cargoItem: type: object description: addresses the cargo items to be stuffed into a container for a shipment. A cargo item cannot be split across containers. allOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/cargoLineItems' - type: object properties: carrierBookingReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/carrierBookingReference' # Extend the carrierBookingReference description for CargoItem - type: object properties: carrierBookingReference: description: 'The associated booking number provided by the carrier for this cargo item. Cannot be used in combination with Shipping Instruction header level carrierBookingReference' - type: object properties: descriptionOfGoods: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/descriptionOfGoods' - type: object properties: HSCode: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/HSCode' - type: object properties: weight: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/weight' - type: object properties: volume: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/volume' - type: object properties: weightUnit: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/weightUnit' - type: object properties: volumeUnit: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/volumeUnit' - type: object properties: numberOfPackages: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/numberOfPackages' - type: object properties: packageCode: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/packageCode' - type: object properties: equipmentReference: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/equipmentReference' required: - descriptionOfGoods - HSCode - numberOfPackages - weight - weightUnit - packageCode - equipmentReference ################################# # Cargo Line Item Related objects ################################# cargoLineItems: type: object properties: cargoLineItems: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/cargoLineItem' cargoLineItem: type: object description: | identifies the specific details of packages within a cargo item. allOf: - type: object properties: cargoLineItemID: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/cargoLineItemID' - type: object properties: shippingMarks: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/shippingMarks' required: - cargoLineItemID - shippingMarks #################################### # Shipment Equipment Related objects #################################### utilizedTransportEquipments: type: object properties: utilizedTransportEquipments: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/utilizedTransportEquipment' utilizedTransportEquipment: type: object description: | specifies the container assigned to a shipment allOf: - type: object properties: equipment: $ref: '#/components/schemas/equipment' - type: object properties: cargoGrossWeightUnit: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/weightUnit' - type: object properties: cargoGrossWeight: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/cargoGrossWeight' - type: object properties: activeReeferSettings: type: object description: specifies the settings for an active reefer container used to a shipment. allOf: - type: object properties: temperatureMin: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/temperatureMin' - type: object properties: temperatureMax: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/temperatureMax' - type: object properties: temperatureUnit: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/temperatureUnit' - type: object properties: humidityMin: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/humidityMin' - type: object properties: humidityMax: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/humidityMax' - type: object properties: ventilationMin: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/ventilationMin' - type: object properties: ventilationMax: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/ventilationMax' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/seals' required: - equipment - cargoGrossWeightUnit - cargoGrossWeight ###################### # Seal Related objects ###################### seals: type: object properties: seals: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/seal' seal: type: object description: 'addresses the seal-related information associated with the shipment equipment. A seal is put on a shipment equipment once it is loaded. This seal is meant to stay on until the shipment equipment reaches its final destination.' allOf: - type: object properties: sealNumber: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/sealNumber' - type: object properties: sealSource: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/sealSource' - type: object properties: sealType: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/sealType' required: - sealNumber - sealType ################################ # Document Party Related objects ################################ documentParties: type: object properties: documentParties: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/documentParty' documentParty: description: stores the parties involved in the transport document. type: object allOf: - type: object properties: party: $ref: '#/components/schemas/partyNoID' - type: object properties: partyFunction: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/partyFunction' - type: object properties: displayedAddress: type: array items: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/addressLine' - type: object properties: partyContactDetails: type: object allOf: - type: object properties: name: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/name' - type: object properties: phone: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/phone' - type: object properties: email: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/email' - type: object properties: isToBeNotified: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/isToBeNotified' required: - partyFunction - partyContactDetails - isToBeNotified ####################### # Party Related objects ####################### codeListResponsibleAgencyCode: type: string description: | UN/CEFACT codes for code list providers: - 5 (ISO) - 6 (UN/ECE) - 11 (Lloyd's register of shipping) - 20 (BIC (Bureau International des Containeurs) - 54 (IMO (incl. IMDG)) - 182 (Standard Carrier Alpha Code (SCAC)) - 274 (ITIGG) - 296 (ITU) - 306 (SMDG) - 399 (EXIS) - zzz (Mutually defined) Deprecated: Use DCSAResponsibleAgencyCode instead enum: - "5" - "6" - "11" - "20" - "54" - "182" - "274" - "296" - "306" - "399" - "zzz" example: "306" deprecated: true DCSAResponsibleAgencyCode: type: string description: | A DCSA provided code for UN/CEFACT code list providers: - ISO - UNECE - LLOYD (Lloyd's register of shipping) - BIC (Bureau International des Containeurs) - IMO - SCAC (Standard Carrier Alpha Code) - ITIGG - ITU - SMDG - EXIS - FMC (Federal Maritime Commission) - CBSA (Canada Border Services Agency) - ZZZ (Mutually defined) enum: - "ISO" - "UNECE" - "LLOYD" - "BIC" - "IMO" - "SCAC" - "ITIGG" - "ITU" - "SMDG" - "EXIS" - "FMC" - "CBSA" - "ZZZ" example: "SMDG" partyCode: type: string description: | Code to identify the party as provided by the agency maxLength: 100 example: MSK codeListName: type: string description: | The name of the list, provided by the responsible agency maxLength: 100 example: LCL partyNoID: description: 'refers to a company or a legal entity.' type: object allOf: - type: object properties: partyName: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/partyName' - type: object properties: taxReference1: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/taxReference1' - type: object properties: taxReference2: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/taxReference2' - type: object properties: publicKey: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/publicKey' - type: object properties: address: allOf: - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/LOCATION_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/address' - type: object properties: identifyingCodes: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/identifyingCode' - type: object properties: nmftaCode: allOf: - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.3#/components/schemas/nmftaCode' - deprecated: true - description: The Standard Carrier Alpha Code (SCAC) provided by NMFTA.

Deprecated: Replaced by DCSAResponsibleAgencyCode and partyCode defined in the identifyingCodes list identifyingCode: type: object allOf: - type: object properties: codeListResponsibleAgencyCode: $ref: '#/components/schemas/codeListResponsibleAgencyCode' -
